### Consultations on Blood Safety in Canada
#### Overview
The Government of Canada is issuing an invitation to propose for the provision of services to conduct consultations on blood safety in Canada. This consultation will provide recommendations to the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) on its roles, responsibilities, and priorities in the surveillance of blood transfusions and cell, tissue, and organ transplantation.

#### Contract Details
* **Contract Reference Number**: CB-8850-34429056
* **Solicitation Number**: 1000248797/A
* **Publication Date**: September 7, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 31, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 13, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: August 30, 2024
* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: The contractor with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be selected.

#### Service Description
The successful contractor will conduct consultations and provide recommendations to PHAC on its roles, responsibilities, and priorities in the surveillance of blood transfusions and cell, tissue, and organ transplantation. The contractor will be expected to work off-site from their own facilities.

#### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity for this tender is Health Canada, located at 200 Eglantine Driveaway, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K9.
